title: Nostalgia Retro Compact Countertop Microwave Oven, 0.7 Cu. Ft. 700-Watts with LED Digital Display, Child Lock, Easy Clean Interior, Orange
features: 700-Watts Cooking Power: At 0.7 cubic foot, this microwave provides the cooking power needed to quickly cook and reheat foods

Convenient Cooking Controls: 12 pre-programmed cooking settings, delay timer and express cooking provide options for the optimal heating of popular foods like popcorn, pizza, potatoes, veggies and more
Digital Clock: Easy-to-read LED display lights up the digital clock and highlights each cooking setting
Even Cooking: Rotating glass carousel helps cook food evenly
Retro Accents: A sleek chrome door handle, control panel and accents add fun and flair to this unique retro-styled appliance
Simple Program Dial: Easily navigate cooking settings with simple turn-and-push program dial
Interior Dimension: 13 L x 13 W x 8 H inch
description: With a beautiful and sleek retro design, this microwave is sure to stand out in any kitchen. It features 12-pre programmed cooking settings and a bright LED display, making usability simple. Five power levels and 700-watts of power are perfect for reheating leftovers or cooking food.
